QueryResult.text:
SELECT ID , NAME , LOOKUP_CODE CODE , DESCRIPTION , LANGUAGE_CODE , IS_ACTIVE FROM CMN_LOOKUPS_V WHERE LOOKUP_TYPE = 'PRTIMEENTRY_USER_LOV1' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 'A' FROM CMN_OPTION_VALUES WHERE OPTION_ID IN ( SELECT ID FROM CMN_OPTIONS WHERE OPTION_CODE = 'NKT.GEN.LOOKUP_4_USER_VALUE1') AND USER_ID IS NULL AND VALUE = 'PRTIMEENTRY_USER_LOV1')
UNION
SELECT ID, LOOKUP_CODE NAME, LOOKUP_CODE CODE, LOOKUP_CODE DESCRIPTION , 'en' LANGUAGE_CODE , 1 IS_ACTIVE FROM USER_LOV1_ALL_V WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 'A' FROM CMN_OPTION_VALUES WHERE OPTION_ID IN ( SELECT ID FROM CMN_OPTIONS WHERE OPTION_CODE = 'NKT.GEN.LOOKUP_4_USER_VALUE1') AND USER_ID IS NULL AND VALUE = 'PRTIMEENTRY_USER_LOV1')
